sectionHeading: Upcoming Road Closure Scheduled for Manchester St

location: Monday 5/15/23 thru Friday 6/16/23.
The westbound lane (from Oliver Lewis Way toward the RR tracks) will be closed for Town Branch Trail construction.
The eastbound lane will remain open.
Detour via Oliver Lewis Way -> Versailles Rd -> S Forbes Rd.
